MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the KA23 area of West Kilbride. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 5:05am. We are aware of the previous power cuts affecting your area and we apologise for this. Our control centre will attempt to reset the network remotely to restore power in stages, and our engineers are currently onsite in the local area investigating the fault. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 8:15am. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7:01am on Sunday, 01 November 2020
